mapper.insert: insert into category (type, `name`, sort, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{type}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser})
mapper.select: select id, type, `name`, sort, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user from category order by sort asc limit #{start}, #{size}
mapper.update: update category set type = coalesce(#{type}, type), `name` = coalesce(#{name}, `name`), sort = coalesce(#{sort}, sort), update_time = coalesce(#{updateTime}, update_time), update_user=coalesce(#{updateUser}, update_user) where id = #{id}
